title: Configure your private Git repositories so that you can use them in your AI products
gitParagraphe2: Private Git repositories let you connect your AI products and Git projects however you need.
gitParagraphe3: Private Git repositories are specific to AI products.
formGitErrorMaxLength: Please enter a maximum of {{max}} characters
formGitNameErrorPattern: Must only contain numbers, letters, underscores and dashes, and must not start with a dash.
formGitToastSuccessDescription: Your private Git repository has been added
formGitToastErrorTitle: An error has occurred adding your private Git repository
deleteGitDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the {{ alias }} Git repository?
deleteGitToastErrorTitle: An error has occurred deleting your private Git repository
deleteGitToastSuccessDescription: The {{ alias }} private Git repository has been deleted
